unavailable_apis: rawInput as direct property (use getRawInput() async function)
removed_from_previous: rawInput as direct property in middleware (use getRawInput())
key_features: Transformer (superjson) at link config level, NOT at client level
getRawInput() async function in middleware (replaces direct rawInput)
Async generator subscriptions (async function* with yield)
Shorthand routers (plain objects as sub-routers, no t.router() needed)
Streaming queries via async generators in .query()
breaking_changes: Transformer moved from client level to link level
rawInput in middleware replaced by getRawInput() async function
notes: Client function is createTRPCClient, NOT createTRPCProxyClient
transformer: superjson goes INSIDE httpBatchLink({}), NOT at createTRPCClient({}) level
Middleware uses getRawInput() as async function: const input = await getRawInput()
SSG helper is createSSGHelpers, NOT createProxySSGHelpers
httpSubscriptionLink enables SSE-based subscriptions (alternative to wsLink)
Server subscriptions use async function* with yield pattern
Shorthand routers: nested routes can be plain objects without t.router()
Streaming queries: .query(async function* () { yield ... }) for iterable results
Use splitLink to route subscription operations to httpSubscriptionLink
